summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building robust, scalable backend systems and full-stack applications. Expert in Go, TypeScript, and cloud infrastructure. Proven track record of optimizing critical APIs (70% performance improvement), leading cross-functional teams, and driving AI-powered developer workflows. Currently at Weaviate, delivering resilient cloud services and end-to-end feature development.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Own backend features end-to-end, collaborating across teams for alignment and delivery
Lead incident response and maintain database backup reliability for cloud infrastructure
Build frontend integrations exposing backend features to cloud users
Drive adoption of AI-powered tools and workflows to boost team productivity

experience.title: Senior Backend Engineer
achievements: Built and maintained 12+ microservices in Go, including APIs and KPI tracking systems
Owned 7 critical internal libraries ensuring seamless integration across projects
Optimized critical API achieving 70% performance improvement
Mentored junior developers, accelerating their onboarding and contribution

experience.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
achievements: Developed 7+ full-stack web and mobile apps across diverse industries
Led technical development of VoIP app supporting Lebanese Red Cross during pandemic
Championed Flutter adoption, improving cross-platform development efficiency

experience.title: Founding Software Engineer
achievements: Built end-to-end Quality Management platform using Spring Boot and Angular
Designed and maintained backend API and web application architecture
